title: mStableDAO Signer Compensation
body:
0xba0E104fF9a400089cc4882f976094fde14AC5E3, who is actively participating in the mStableDAO signer group, still requires their compensation to be set up and streamed into their wallet via Sablier. 

Considering a 1,000 MTA compensation per month as a mStableDAO signer, 12,000 MTA are to be put into a Sablier stream created by the mStableDAO Gnosis Safe and vested to 0xba0E104fF9a400089cc4882f976094fde14AC5E3 over the next 12 months.

This assumes a full service term of 12 months as a DAO signer, and 0xba0E104fF9a400089cc4882f976094fde14AC5E3 **must abstain from voting in this proposal.**

**Should 0xba0E104fF9a400089cc4882f976094fde14AC5E3 be compensated with the amounts described above, assuming a full service term of 12 months as a DAO signer?**
choices: No, do not compensate the signer
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
